user.title: Motis departures
user.description:
Enter your preferred Motis url and station.
Default instance is [Transitous](https://transitous.org)

error.invalid_format: Remove prefixes like clientID= and trailing spaces from the value.

data.action: Choose an action to manage your stations:

search_station.title: Search for a Station
search_station.description: Enter the name of the station you want to add. In the next step, you can select the correct station from the search results.

select_station.title: Select a Station
select_station.description: Select the station you want to add from the search results and optionally configure platform and line.

remove_station.title: Remove a Station
remove_station.description: Select the station you want to remove from the list.

error.duplicate_station: This station-platform-line combination is already configured.
